mapper.select: SELECT /* DP_APP_PRODUCT-selectDPAppProduct : mhcha123 (2014-01-03) */ PROD_ID ,AID ,WAP_PROD_NM ,PLAT_CLSF_CD ,USE_MANU_FILE_PATH ,USE_MANU_FILE_NM ,VER_MAJOR ,VER_MINOR ,SKT_OPEN_API_USE_YN ,SDK_VER ,REG_ID ,REG_DT ,UPD_ID ,UPD_DT ,DEV_CMPY_NM ,PROD_SPEC ,PROD_CLSF_CD ,PKG_NM ,DESC_VIDEO_URL ,DCLB ,CONTENTS_TYPE_CD ,PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD ,DGRE_CD ,PKG_VER_CD ,DBM_UPDT_DT ,GAME_CENTR_ID ,GAME_CENTR_VER_CD ,SALE_STRT_DT ,FULL_PROD_ID ,SALE_STATUS_INFO ,DCMF_PID ,USE_PERIOD ,DUP_PRCHS_PMT_YN ,SERVER_IP_AUTH_YN ,SERVER_PRD_CNT ,SERVER_IP ,APP_SVC_CASE ,DVLPR_CASE ,PROD_ISSU_SERVER_EXNE_CASE ,PROD_CASE ,PROD_KIND ,PERIODISTT_PROD_AUTH_MAND_YN ,APP_LIMT_YN ,VERIFY_PATH FROM TB_DP_APP_PROD WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId}
